backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with all game, lobby, tournament, wallet, stats, and player profile types, including Omaha and Spades game state structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for major frontend files describing hooks, components, UI behavior, and game logic.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app at the root element and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controller handling identity, actor loading, admin checks, game mode, quick play routing, and global modals (wallet connect/install).
frontend/src/components/AdminSettings.ts: Admin dashboard for updating house cut and viewing live system stats with validation, API calls, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectiv: UI badge showing backend connectivity status using actor retry logic, with tooltips for errors and reconnect attempts.
frontend/src/components/DepositWithdrawM: Modal for depositing or withdrawing funds with Flexa payment flow, balance polling, and wallet integration.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GoLiveHelp.tsx: Help card explaining how to publish an app live on the Internet Computer and where to find public links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, wallet connections, mode switching, and deposit/withdraw modals.
frontend/src/components/LivePublishStatu: Displays current site origin, public ICP link, and build metadata with copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/LobbyBrowser.tsx: UI for browsing or quick‑playing game lobbies, with placeholders for upcoming multiplayer features.
frontend/src/components/LobbyRoom.tsx: Placeholder component for future multiplayer lobby room functionality.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Handles user profile creation for online and offline modes, generating guest wallets and saving profiles locally or via API.
frontend/src/components/QuickPlayGame.ts: Runs quick-play Spades or Omaha games, initializing sessions and rendering the correct game component with player actions.
frontend/src/components/TournamentSectio: Displays a placeholder tournaments section with different descriptions and badges depending on game mode.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnectMod: Provides a modal for connecting via WalletConnect, offering QR codes or mobile deep-links and copy-to-clipboard URI support.
frontend/src/components/WalletInstallMod: Shows a modal prompting users to install a Web3 wallet, linking to Coinbase Wallet and MetaMask.
frontend/src/components/WalletSection.ts: Displays wallet info, balance, transactions, and player stats for both online and offline modes, with deposit and withdraw modals.
Defines a context wrapping Web3 wallet state and actions, exposing connection status and utility functions to the app.
frontend/src/games/omaha/bots.ts: Provides a simple Omaha bot that chooses fold, check, call, or bet based on current state and randomness.
frontend/src/games/omaha/engine.ts: Implements Omaha game setup, deck creation, shuffling, dealing, action validation, and action execution.
frontend/src/games/omaha/handEvaluator.t: Evaluates Omaha hands by checking all valid 5‑card combinations and ranking them for winner determination.
frontend/src/games/omaha/OmahaCommunityB: Renders five community card slots, revealing cards based on the current street and showing fallback text if missing.
frontend/src/games/omaha/types.ts: Defines Omaha card, player, and game state types plus helpers for card formatting and suit coloring.
frontend/src/games/session/quickPlaySess: Manages creation of Spades or Omaha sessions and executes player or bot actions for each game type.
frontend/src/games/spades/bots.ts: Implements simple Spades bot logic for selecting bids and choosing legal cards to play.
frontend/src/games/spades/engine.ts: Handles Spades game initialization, deck operations, bidding, card play, trick flow, and hand progression.
frontend/src/games/spades/scoring.ts: Defines scoring rules for Spades, checks target score, and determines the winning player.
frontend/src/games/spades/types.ts: Defines core Spades types including cards, players, game state, and helpers for suit symbols and colors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps useActor with error handling and retry state to track connectivity and provide friendly error messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data such as profiles, lobbies, tournaments, and metadata using actor retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuickPlaySession.t: Manages quick‑play game sessions with bot action processing, bid submission, and card play handling for Spades and Omaha.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3Wallet.ts: Implements Web3 wallet detection, connection, balance fetching, guest wallets, and transaction readiness logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode values, utility classes, scrollbar styling, and custom playing-card visuals.
frontend/src/lib/web3modal.ts: Exports Base chain config, app metadata, and a placeholder null Web3Modal object for future wallet integration.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/icpLinks.ts: Provides helpers to detect canister IDs, build IC gateway URLs, and copy text to clipboard with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/sleep.ts: Simple promise-based sleep helper for delaying async actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and feature requirements related to wallet connection UX fixes.
